item.title: Welcome to my blog!
item.description: I will try to keep this blog alive and put everything related to my studies, work and life.

item.title: About
item.description: Hey there! My name is Mehti Musayev. In my free time, I enjoy traveling, table tennis (ping pong), tennis, badminton, cycling, swimming, surfing, and snowboarding. If you’d like to connect, feel free to reach out. My career path Link to heading My journey into computer science is quite typical. I developed an interest in mathematics and physics during my secondary school studies. After graduating from the Presidential Physics and Mathematics Lyceum 239, I continued my education at one of Russia’s most prestigious and renowned faculties—the Mathematics and Mechanics Faculty of Saint Petersburg State University, which is among the top universities in the country.

item.title: Projects
item.description: During my career I have been collaborating into limited number of open source and industrial projects. My volunteer work for open source community started in 2016 when I was using several projects at work. In the following list one can find all open source and industrial projects where I am currently/used to be represented as a collaborator/team member: Open source projects: RedBaron baron yapf (owned by Google) ELFI (owned by Aalto University, Finland) Industrial projects:
